menus: <menuitem name="Go to Code" showIf="dw.getNumberOfMatchingSelectors() <= 1" command="dw.handleLiveViewGotoCode(0)" enabled="dw.getNumberOfMatchingSelectors() == 1" domRequired="FALSE" id="DWLiveViewContext_GotoCSSCode_SingleRule" /> <menuitem name="Paste Styles" showIf="dw.getNumberOfMatchingSelectors() <= 1 || (dw.getNumberOfMatchingSelectors() > 1 && !dw.isContentAvailableForCSSPaste())" command="dw.handleLiveViewPasteStyles(0)" enabled="dw.getNumberOfMatchingSelectors() == 1 && dw.isContentAvailableForCSSPaste()" domRequired="FALSE" id="DWLiveViewContext_PasteStyles_SingleRule" />
